table.title: Only Knowledge objects on both stacks

search.query: | inputlookup $lookup$_all_eventtypes_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.owner as src_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING, tags as src_TAGS, search as src_SEARCH | append [| rest splunk_server=local servicesNS/-/-/saved/eventtypes | fields eai:acl.app,eai:acl.owner,eai:acl.sharing,search,tags,title | rename eai:acl.app as dest_APP, eai:acl.owner as dest_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as dest_SHARING, tags as dest_TAGS, search as dest_SEARCH | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search src=true dest=true | sort src_APP | fields title, *_APP, *_SEARCH | eval equal = if(src_SEARCH==dest_SEARCH,1,0) | search equal=$equal$
